name: Forefathers Eve: LAST RITUAL
description:
Forefathers' Eve: Last ritual is a 2D action platform game, inspired by Polish dramatic poem called “Dziady” written by Adam Mickiewicz. In this poem the author reflects the local folk tales of Polish peasants.

You are one of the audience and your task is to put an end to the ritual. The question is whether you will succeed or not?

This Game is an alternative interpretation of the poem.
